topic.title: ZeroNet on TOR
topic.body: Hey, i've been trying to put ZeroNet on tor but it doesn't work, i've read about going in about:config and that i have to change something in the network.proxy.no_proxies_on entry but what do i need to put in ?

1622847784_1HKsVQMZ4JucuBTtzpErwhLKMnScU.body: says The connection failed, Firefox can not establish the connection to 127.0.0.1:43110

> [smashbuckler](#comment_86_114yCZGnUqTUcasBbAKUS6xmhQyDPC1ZXt): What do you mean "it does not work"? What exactly is the error?

says The connection failed, Firefox can not establish the connection to 127.0.0.1:43110
